content_outline.h1: Betovo Sportsbook Review: Features, App, and Betting Experience

sections.heading: Introduction & Quick Answer
sections.instructions: Open with direct answer: Is Betovo worth joining? Follow with market context about sports betting ireland. Include affiliate disclosure (50-75 words). Total 250 words.

sections.heading: Betovo Review: Rating Summary
sections.instructions: 5-star rating breakdown: Odds (4/5), Markets (4.5/5), App (4/5), Bonuses (4.5/5), Support (4/5). Overall: 4.2/5. Explain each category briefly.

sections.heading: Comprehensive Feature Analysis
sections.instructions: Deep dive on all major features. Must include Bet Mentor tool as key differentiator.

subsections.heading: Betting Markets & Odds Quality
subsections.instructions: Cover 35+ sports, 4,000+ events, zero-margin markets, flash markets. Compare odds to Paddy Power/Bet365.

subsections.heading: Welcome Bonus & Promotions Breakdown
subsections.instructions: 3-part deposit bonus: 100% up to €250, 75% up to €500, 75% up to €250. Total: €1,000. Explain terms, wagering requirements, sports jackpot promos.

subsections.heading: Bet Mentor Tool: How It Works
subsections.instructions: CRITICAL DIFFERENTIATOR. Explain what Bet Mentor does, how users access it, what insights it provides. This is a content gap vs competitors.

subsections.heading: Payment Methods & Withdrawal Times
subsections.instructions: Visa, MasterCard, Bank Transfer, Apple Pay, Revolut, Cryptocurrency (Bitcoin, Ethereum). Highlight crypto speed (almost immediate) vs cards (3+ days).

subsections.heading: User Experience & Account Setup
subsections.instructions: Registration process, login experience, account verification. Mention how quickly users can start betting.

sections.heading: Betovo App Review: Progressive Web App Experience
sections.instructions: Focus on PWA (Progressive Web App) - works on iOS/Android without app store download. Compare to native apps from other Irish bookmakers. Include installation guide.

subsections.heading: How the Betovo App Compares to Other Irish Betting Apps
subsections.instructions: Compare PWA approach vs Paddy Power/Bet365 native apps. Pros: No store download, instant updates. Cons: Less integration with device features.

sections.heading: Live Betting & Streaming on Betovo
sections.instructions: HD live streaming availability, in-play markets, early payout options. What sports have live streaming? How does interface work during live events?

sections.heading: Betovo Casino Review
sections.instructions: Casino offering alongside sportsbook. Slots, table games, live dealer. Operated by SoftGenius N.V. Note this is primarily a sportsbook review but casino exists.

sections.heading: How Betovo Compares to the Best Betting Sites in Ireland
sections.instructions: Compare Betovo vs Paddy Power, Bet365, BoyleSports. Use all 3 keywords naturally. Comparison table: odds, markets, bonuses, app quality. Betovo strengths: Bet Mentor, zero-margin markets, crypto payments.

sections.heading: GAA Betting on Betovo
sections.instructions: IRISH MARKET FOCUS. Coverage of GAA (Gaelic football, hurling). Markets available, odds quality for county championships, All-Ireland series. This is a content gap vs international competitors.

sections.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
sections.instructions: 7 FAQs targeting keyword searches. See FAQ list below.

sections.heading: Responsible Gambling at Betovo
sections.instructions: 18+ requirement, Problem Gambling Ireland resources, Gamblers Anonymous Ireland, self-exclusion tools, deposit limits. Ireland-specific support.

sections.heading: Final Verdict: Is Betovo Worth It?
sections.instructions: Summary judgment. Best for: Bettors who want Bet Mentor insights, crypto users, GAA fans. Not ideal for: Users preferring native apps. Overall rating: 4.2/5.

faq_questions.question: Is Betovo a legit betting site in Ireland?
faq_questions.answer_brief: Yes, Betovo operates legally in Ireland. Licensed operator SoftGenius N.V. Verified payment methods and responsible gambling tools.

faq_questions.question: How do I download the Betovo app?
faq_questions.answer_brief: Betovo uses a Progressive Web App (PWA). Visit betovo.com on mobile browser, tap 'Add to Home Screen'. Works on iOS and Android without app store download.

faq_questions.question: What is the Betovo welcome bonus for Irish customers?
faq_questions.answer_brief: 3-part deposit bonus totaling €1,000: First deposit 100% up to €250, second deposit 75% up to €500, third deposit 75% up to €250. Terms and wagering requirements apply.

faq_questions.question: Can I bet on GAA with Betovo?
faq_questions.answer_brief: Yes, Betovo offers GAA betting markets for Gaelic football and hurling, including county championships and All-Ireland series.

faq_questions.question: How fast are Betovo withdrawals?
faq_questions.answer_brief: Cryptocurrency withdrawals are almost immediate. E-wallets take 1-3 business days. Card withdrawals take 3+ business days.

faq_questions.question: Does Betovo have live streaming for Irish customers?
faq_questions.answer_brief: Yes, Betovo offers HD live streaming on select events. Availability varies by sport and licensing agreements.

faq_questions.question: What is the Bet Mentor tool on Betovo?
faq_questions.answer_brief: Bet Mentor is Betovo's exclusive betting insights tool that provides data-driven recommendations and analysis to help inform betting decisions.
